relation: Specifies the application stripe where the resource is deleted.
Specifies the name of the resource deleted.
Specifies the type of resource deleted. The passed resource type must be present in the application stripe at the time this script is invoked.
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {825683=HOK Symmetric Key Generation Algorithm: http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#aes128-cbc, 609755=cacheTimeOut—Amount of time cached information remains in the OAM Agent cache when the information is neither used nor referenced. Default = 1800 (seconds)., 53920=The following command generates a certificate signing request with DN cn=www.acme.com and key size 1024 in wallet1, for Oracle Internet Directory instance oid1, in application server instance inst1:, 234401=The following command deletes the authentication engine with ID id1234., 674366=cacheTimeout—Amount of time cached information remains in the OAM Agent cache when the information is neither used nor referenced. Default = 1800 (seconds)., 58353=The following command adds a self-signed certificate with DN cn=www.acme.com, key size 1024 to wallet1, for Oracle Internet Directory instance oid1, in application server instance inst1:, 236465=The following command deletes the engine with ID id1234., 110900=The following command generates a key pair with DN cn=www.acme.com, key size 1024, algorithm RSA and alias mykey in keys.jks, for Oracle Virtual Directory instance ovd1 in application server instance inst1:}
textBeforeTable: createCred(map, key, user, password, [desc])  Optional arguments are enclosed in square brackets. Syntax      Creates a new credential in the domain credential store with a given map name, key name, type, user name and password, URL and port number. In the event of an error, the command returns a WLSTException. This command runs in interactive mode only. Description    Online command that creates a new credential in the domain credential store. createCred    password="myPassw", desc="updated passw cred to connect to app xyz") wls:/mydomain/serverConfig> updateCred(map="myMap", key="myKey", user="myUsr",  The following invocation updates a password credential with the specified data: Example       Specifies a string describing the credential. desc     Specifies the credential password.  password     Specifies the credential user name.  user     Specifies a key name.  key     Specifies a map name (folder).
textAfterTable: password Specifies the credential password.  desc Specifies a string describing the credential. Example The following invocation creates a new password credential with the specified data:  wls:/mydomain/serverConfig> createCred(map="myMap, key="myKey", user="myUsr",  password="myPassw", desc="updated usr name and passw to connect to app xyz") deleteCred Online command that removes a credential in the domain credential store. Description Removes a credential with given map name and key name from the domain credential store. In the event of an error, the command returns a WLSTException. Syntax  deleteCred(map,key) Argument Definition  map  Specifies a map name (folder).  key Specifies a key name.
